result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for interacting with the GeckoTerminal API and defining data models for the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating API client functionality and data models in separate files.

internal/infras/geckoterminal/client.go.purpose: This file defines a client for interacting with a GeckoTerminal API to retrieve pool and token data.

internal/infras/geckoterminal/models.go.purpose: Defines data models and types for the Gecko terminal application.
